alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 13 at 7:10PM EST until January 15 at 10:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ SUNDAY TO 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...In Indiana, Northern La Porte, Eastern St. Joseph IN, Southern La Porte and Western St. Joseph IN Counties. In Michigan, St. Joseph MI County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ Sunday to 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
